column24:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Tackle hill climbs and long distances in these Adidas Supernova Shorts. The running shorts are made with CLIMACOOL® to draw cool air in and pull heat and sweat out
column25:
and the FORMOTION® design provides optimal range of motion as you run. Team it with a tee and trainers and you're good to go.

  • Product Details

  • Red shorts with green in-built shorts (with pocket at back waist)
column26: engineered with ventilated ClimaCool technology that keeps you cool and dry
column27: FORMOTION® design follows the  natural movement of sport for a better fit and greater comfort in  motion
column28: elasticated waistband with contrast internal drawstrings for a snug fit and internal media pocket (miCoach) at left waist
column29: panel at back under waistband with brand print
column32:
brand print above front left leg hem
Warranty: 3 months from the date of purchase

against manufacturing defects

    Machine wash cold

column25:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • This skort from Adidas is ultra comfortable and designed to enhance your performance during training or while working out. The ClimaLite technology keeps your body dry and comfortable while the polyester fabric provides ease of movement. Pair this piece with a tank top and sneakers for a game of tennis.

  • Product Details

  • Bright pink skort (shorts with a skirt on top)
column27: inverted box pleats on the sides on the front
column28: Adidas logo on the left bottom
column29: ClimaLite logo on the right on the waistband at the back and  contrast piping detail below it
column30:
inverted box pleat in the middle at the back

  • Material & Care

  • 100% polyester
    Wash below 30°C

  • Size & Fit

  • Regular fit
    The model (height 5' 8" and waist 28") is wearing a size M
